content:
When trying to execute _reference search query:

{ EncounterList(_reference: patient) {status}}

URL: http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR5/Patient/505/$graphql?query={%20EncounterList(_reference:%20patient)%20{status}}

HAPI always returns empty list.

But this works here: http://test.fhir.org/r4/Patient/23320/$graphql?query={%20EncounterList(_reference:%20subject)%20{status}}

Does HAPI support reverse lookup?
